recipe.name: Tahoe Banana-Oat Pancakes
recipe.preparation: Mix oats and milk in a large bowl. Let stand until oats are soft (about 15 minutes). Mix in mashed bananas, eggs, wheat germ and cinnamon. Gradually stir in pancake mix (batter will be very thick).
recipe.notes: My friend Kristi had access to a cabin in Tahoe and would invite all of us up for a weekend of skiing and drunken frivolity. Knowing that I was going to be on the hook for at least one meal, I delved for the first time into Epicurious and dug up these hearty fellers. I'll forever remember wandering about the Raley's down at Stateline in search of Wheat Germ. As a testament to the durability of that stuff, I still had a container of it from that trip years later. From Epicurious/Bon Appetit 7/97
